ThingDef.label: Horned Kath Hound
ThingDef.description: Horned Kath Hounds attack with a combination of their horns and sharp claws, reserving their bite for chewing up prey. Horned Kath Hounds usually travel in their own packs, but some serve as the alpha for a group of regular Kath Hounds, cowing them into submission. Horned Kath Hounds are not subtle hunters and prefer bowling over prey with a mighty charge before goring and clawing their victim to death. They are notoriously tough creatures with thick hides that can deflect all but the best placed attacks.

ThingDef.label: Arkonok
ThingDef.description: Arkonoks were domesticated herd beasts on the planet Onderon. They were infamous for their unpredictable fits of rage which put tamers in serious danger. Their meat was prized as a delicacy on the planet, despite being generally regarded as nothing out of the ordinary.

ThingDef.label: Bantha
ThingDef.description: Banthas were a species of large, hairy mammals with sharp, spiraling horns. They inhabited the desert planet Tatooine, though they were bred on many worlds throughout the galaxy. They were social herd animals, and were often domesticated, and used prominently as mounts and companionship.

ThingDef.label: Boma
ThingDef.description: Bomas were ravenous beasts native to Onderon and its moon Dxun. Although most bomas were generally small, there were some that were extremely large in size. They were dangerous predators and known to kill Mandalorians, but they themselves were preyed upon by the zakkeg beasts.

ThingDef.label: dewback
ThingDef.description: Dewbacks were thick-skinned reptiles native to the desert planet of Tatooine, where they were used as beasts of burden.

ThingDef.label: drate
ThingDef.description: Drate lizard were a species of quadruped reptiles found on Taris. They had a frilled protuberance on top of the head and on both sides of the neck. They possessed a row of circular yellow spots on their flanks.

ThingDef.label: rill
ThingDef.description: Rills were reptiles native to Tatooine. They were not aggressive unless attacked. They had spines along their backs and very sharp teeth, and lived in Tatooine's deserts alongside womp rats.

ThingDef.label: Canyon krayt dragon
ThingDef.description: The canyon krayt dragon was the smaller and more common species of krayt dragon, a predatory reptile from Tatooine. As its named suggested, it dwelled in rock caves and canyons.[1] Canyon krayt dragons had brown skin and yellow eyes, and their head was covered with a multitude of horns.
